T04sanss08u:116: trividhaṃ kāyikaṃ karma vacasā ca caturvidham /
T04sanss08u:117: manasā triprakāreṇa tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
T04sanss08u:119: kṛtaṃ daśavidhaṃ karma tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //

T04sanss08u:123: bhavagatisaṃkaṭe bālabuddhinā pāpaṃ yan me kṛtaṃ sudāruṇam /

T04sanss08u:130: viśeṣatas tu bodhisatvâpattīnāṃ gurvīṇāṃ laghvīnāṃ deśanâryôpāliparipṛcchāyām uktā
T04sanss08u:134: saced upāle mahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisatvo mahāsatvo gaṅgānadīvālikôpamā rāgapratisaṃyuktâpattīr āpadyeta /

T04sanss08u:142: na tatra bodhisatvasya chalaṃ na bhayaṃ //

T04sanss08u:149: tatrôpāle ye 'nupāyakuśalā bodhisatvās te rāgapratisaṃyuktābhyâpattibhyo bibhyati /
T04sanss08u:152: bodhisatvās te dveṣasaṃprayuktābhyâpattibhyo bibhyati na rāgapratisaṃyuktābhyêti //
T04sanss08u:157: kevalayā ca kṛpayā kleśabalād acireṇa kṛpāhāniḥ //

T04sanss08u:160: sa yadā kāṅkṣeta prakramaṇāya tadâikamantravidyābalena sarvabandhanāni chittvā prakramet /
T04sanss08u:161: evam eva kulaputrôpāyakuśalo bodhisatvaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇai ratiṃ vindati taiś câkīrṇo viharati /
T04sanss08u:162: yadā ca punar ākāṅkṣate tadā prajñābalâdhīnenâikena ca sarvajñatācittena sarvakāmaguṇān prabhujya cyuto brahmalokae upapadyatae iti //
T04sanss08u:166: parârthasiddhiṃ vā svârthād gurutarām adhimucyamānaḥ kopaparavattayâpi param anuśāsyânutāpapūrvakam āyatyāṃ saṃvaram utpadyate /
T04sanss08u:172: yady api tasya satvasya taddhitaṃ tathâpi bodhisatvakṛpāhānyā mahataḥ satvârthânubandhasya hāniḥ syāt //
T04sanss08u:174: yaś ca tatrâpi kṛpāpratiṣedhaḥ sa lokârthapāṇḍityena lokâvarjanârthaṃ /
T04sanss08u:177: dhisatve pratighaṃ labheta sa bodhisatvaḥ syād ubhayor anarthaḥ //

T04sanss08u:214: upāyakauśalyasūtre jyotirmāṇavakaṃ dvācatvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrabrahmacāriṇam adhikṛtya saptame pade sthitasya kāruṇyam utpadyeta /
T04sanss08u:215: kiṃ câpy aham idaṃ vrataṃ khaṇḍayitvā nirayaparāyaṇaḥ syāṃ /

T04sanss08u:226: utsoḍhavyam eva bhagavan bodhisatvenâpattim āpattuṃ tac ca nairayikaṃ duṣkhaṃ /

T04sanss08u:330: pramāṇabhūtānāṃ jānatāṃ paśyatām agrataḥ pratideśayāmi āviṣkaromi na praticchādayāmy
T04sanss08u:332: samanvāharantu māṃ te buddhā bhagavanto yan mayâsyāṃ jātāv anyāsu vā jātiṣv anavarâgre vā jātisaṃsāre saṃsaratā dānaṃ dattaṃ bhaved antaśas
T04sanss08u:334: yâpy ālopaḥ śīlaṃ vā rakṣitaṃ bhaved yac ca me brahmacaryavāsakuśalamūlaṃ yac ca
T04sanss08u:335: me satvaparipākakuśalamūlaṃ yac ca me bodhicittakuśalamūlaṃ yac ca me 'nuttarajñānakuśalamūlaṃ
T04sanss08u:337: arāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhaûttarôttarayā pariṇāmanayā yathā pariṇāmitam atītair buddhair
T04sanss08u:338: bhagavadbhir yathā pariṇāmayiṣyanty anāgatā buddhā bhagavanto yathā pariṇamanty etarhi
T04sanss08u:344: ye câbhyatītās tathâpi ca ye 'nāgatā ye câpi tiṣṭhanti narôttamā jināḥ /
T04sanss08u:345: anantavarṇān guṇasāgarôpamān upaimi sarvān śaraṇaṃ kṛtâñjaliḥ /
T04sanss08u:346: ye bodhisatvāḥ karuṇabalair upetā vicarati loke satvahitāya śūrāḥ trāyantu te māṃ sadapāpakāriṇaṃ [[DOUBT]] /
T04sanss08u:349: iti hi śāriputra bodhisatvenêmān pañcatriṃśato buddhān pramukhān kṛtvā sarvatathāgatânugatair manasikāraiḥ pāpaśuddhiḥ kāryā /
T04sanss08u:350: tasyâivaṃ sarvapāpaviśuddhasya tatra ca buddhā bhagavanto mukhāny upadarśayanti satvavimokṣârtham eva /
T04sanss08u:353: na śakyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhanikāyair āpattikaukṛtyasthānaṃ viśodhayituṃ yad
T04sanss08u:354: bodhisatvas teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nāmadheyadhāraṇaparikīrtanena rātriṃdivaṃ
T04sanss08u:360: ye te subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imān evaṃrūpān sūtrântān udgrahīṣyanti yāvat paryavāpsyanti /
T04sanss08u:363: yāni teṣāṃ satvānāṃ paurvajanmikāni karmāṇi kṛtāny apāyasaṃvartanīyāni /
T04sanss08u:364: tāni tayā paribhūtatayā dṛṣṭae eva dharme kṣapayiṣyanti buddhabodhiṃ ca prāpsyantîti //
T04sanss08u:368: yaḥ kāśyapa pitā ca syāt pratyekabuddhaś ca taṃ jīvitād vyaparopayed idam agraṃ prāṇâtipātānāṃ /
T04sanss08u:369: idam agram adattâdānānāṃ yad uta triratnadravyâpaharaṇatā /
T04sanss08u:370: idam agraṃ kāmamithyâcārāṇāṃ yad uta mātā syād arhantī ca /
T04sanss08u:371: idam agraṃ mṛṣāvādānāṃ yad uta tathāgatasyâbhyākhyānaṃ /
T04sanss08u:375: idam agraṃ pāruṣyāṇāṃ yad utâryāṇām avasphaṇḍanaṃ /
T04sanss08u:376: idam agraṃ saṃbhinnapralāpānāṃ yad uta dharmakāmānāṃ vikṣepaḥ /
T04sanss08u:378: idam agram abhidhyānāṃ yad uta samyaggatānāṃ lābhaharaṇacittatā /
T04sanss08u:379: idam agraṃ mithyādṛṣṭīnāṃ yad uta gahanatādṛṣṭiḥ /
T04sanss08u:381: sacet kāśyapâikasatvâibhir evaṃ mahāsâvadyair daśabhir akuśalaiḥ karmapathaiḥ samanvāgato bhavet /
T04sanss08u:382: sa ca tathāgatasya hetupratyayasaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām avataren /
T04sanss08u:383: nâtra kaścid ātmā vā satvo vā jīvo vā pudgalo vā yaḥ karoti pratisaṃvedayate iti
T04sanss08u:384: hy akṛtām anabhisaṃskārāṃ māyādharmatām asaṃkleśadharmatāṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaratāṃ
T04sanss08u:385: sarvadharmāṇām avataraty ādiśuddhān sarvadharmān abhiśraddadhāty adhimucyate /
T04sanss08u:388: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīr yo bodhisatvâpattim anāpattiṃ paśyati /
T04sanss08u:400: athavā caityaṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvann aṣṭasahasraṃ japec caityapratimāyāḥ saddharmapustakānāṃ câikatamaṃ puraskṛtyâyam eva vidhir iti //
T04sanss08u:401: cundādhāraṇīṃ vā tāvaj japed yāvat pāpakṣayanimittāni paśyati svapne /
T04sanss08u:402: tad yathā krandanâdichardanadadhikṣīrâdibhojanāt tu vigatapāpo bhavati /
T04sanss08u:407: tad yathā puruṣo mīḍhâvaliptaḥ sudhautusnānaṃ kṛtvā gandhair vilipyate /
T04sanss08u:408: tasya tad daurgandhyaṃ vāntaṃ vigataṃ syād evaṃ pañcânantaryakāriṇas tat pāpaṃ vigacchati /
T04sanss08u:409: yo 'pi daśâkuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatas tathāgate śraddhāṃ pratilabhya tathāgatabimbaṃ kārayet tasyâpi tat pāpaṃ na prajñāyate viśeṣato bodhicittasamanvāgatasya
T04sanss08u:412: yaś ca khalu punaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitatathāgataṃ saṃmukhaṃ varṣaṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ vā sarvasukhôpadhānair upatiṣṭhed /
T04sanss08u:413: yaś ca parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya caitye bodhicittasaṃgṛhītâikapuṣpam āropayet tathāgatapūjāyai
T04sanss08u:414: janâñjaliṃ côpanāmayej jalena vā siñcayed iṣikāpadaṃ vā dadyān nirmālyaṃ câpanayed
T04sanss08u:415: upalepanapradānaṃ vā puṣpapradānaṃ vā dīpapradānaṃ vā kuryād āttamanāḥ ekakramavyatihāraṃ
T04sanss08u:417: namas tasmai buddhāya bhagavatêtimātre 'tra siṃhavikrīḍitakāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā yad asau kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā durgativinipātaṃ gacchen nêdaṃ-
T04sanss08u:424: ye ca bodhisatvasaṃvaraṃ caturthaṃ śataṃ śikṣāpadānāṃ dhārayanti /
T04sanss08u:425: ye punar abhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāsā bhikṣavaḥ pañcāśâdhike dve śikṣāpadaśate dhārayanti /
T04sanss08u:427: ye ca yathāparigṛhītāc chikṣāsaṃvarād anyatarāc chikṣāpadād bhraṣṭā bhavanti /
T04sanss08u:428: sacet te durgatibhayabhītās tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyur yathāvibhavataś ca pūjāṃ kuryuḥ
T04sanss08u:430: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma /
T04sanss08u:433: yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya guṇān varṇayāmi /
T04sanss08u:434: atha te kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vâtra gambhīre buddhagocare //
T04sanss08u:436: na me bhadanta bhagavan kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrânteṣu /
T04sanss08u:439: imau bhagavan candrasūryāv evaṃ maharddhikāv evaṃ mahânubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ patetāṃ /
T04sanss08u:441: na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet //
T04sanss08u:442: kiṃtu bhadanta bhagavan santi satvāḥ śraddhêndriyavikalā ye buddhagocaraṃ śrutvā na śraddadhati /
T04sanss08u:444: katham idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ smaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasyâittakā guṇânuśaṃsā bhavati /
T04sanss08u:448: teṣāṃ dīrgharātram anarthāyâhitāyâsukhāya vinipātāya bhaviṣyati // bha-
T04sanss08u:451: asthānam ānandânavakāśo yeṣāṃ tasya nāmadheyaṃ nipatet karṇe teṣāṃ durgatyapāyagamanaṃ bhaved iti /
T04sanss08u:453: yac ca tvam ānanda śraddadhāsi pattīyasi /
T04sanss08u:456: abhūmiś câtra śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sthāpayitvâikajātipratibaddhān bodhisatvān mahāsatvān iti //
T04sanss08u:458: ye cânye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vâṣṭâṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upavasanti /
T04sanss08u:459: ekavārṣikaṃ vā traivārṣikaṃ vā śikṣāpadaṃ dhārayanti /
T04sanss08u:461: anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena paścimāyāṃ diśāyāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātaûpapadyema yatrâmitābhas tathāgataḥ /
T04sanss08u:462: yaiḥ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabhavarājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ /
T04sanss08u:463: teṣāṃ maraṇakālasamaye 'ṣṭau bodhisatvā ṛddhyâgatya mārgam upadarśayanti /
T04sanss08u:466: teṣāṃ tatrôpapannānāṃ tat pūrvakaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ na kṣīyate /
T04sanss08u:468: te tataś cyutêha manuṣyaloke rājāno bhavanti /
T04sanss08u:470: anekāni satvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi daśa kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti /
T04sanss08u:477: yena ca punar mātṛgrāmeṇa tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T04sanss08u:491: prāṇâtipātāt prativirato bhavati bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasatvānām abhayaṃdadaḥ /
T04sanss08u:493: yat pūrvântakoṭipañcagaticakrâruḍhena saṃsāranady-udyātena prāṇâtipātahetunā kāyavāṅmanasā karmâvaraṇaṃ kleśâvaraṇaṃ dharmâvaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ vā syāt kāritaṃ vânumoditaṃ syāt /
T04sanss08u:494: tat sarvaṃ tena prāṇâtipātavairamaṇacakreṇa sarvânarthaṃ mardayati /
T04sanss08u:496: sanikāyasabhāge devamanuṣyāṇāṃ priyo bhavati nirātaṅko dīrghâyuṣkêti //
T04sanss08u:497: yāvat punar aparaṃ kulaputra yo bodhisatvo yāvajjīvam adattâdānāt prativirato bhavati sa sarvasatvānām abhayam dadāti anyatrâsayatnenâsaṃkṣobheṇa svalābhena saṃtuṣṭo viharati /
T04sanss08u:500: rmikabhogânabhilāṣī sa tena kuśalamūlena yāvad adattâdānahetukaṃ karmâvaraṇaṃ mardayati pramardayati yāvad aśeṣam avipākaṃ kurutae iti //
T04sanss08u:501: pe //evaṃ daśâpi kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ svavipakṣâkuśalaghātakās tatra paṭhyante //
T04sanss08u:506: kṣapayiṣye pāpakaṃ karma yan mayā purime kṛtam /
T04sanss08u:511: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gacchanti durgatiṃ /
T04sanss08u:512: prahāya mānuṣān kāyān divyān kāyāṃl labhanti te //
T04sanss08u:513: ity evaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ câdhikṛtya pāpakṣayaḥ //
T04sanss08u:520: tad yathā kulaputra hāṭakaprabhāsaṃ nāma rasajātaṃ /
T04sanss08u:522: na ca tatra tat palaṃ śakyate tena lohapalasahasreṇa paryādātuṃ /
T04sanss08u:524: evam evâikaḥ sarvajñatācittôtpādarasadhātuḥ kuśalamūlapariṇāmanājñānasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvakarmakleśâvaraṇalohāni pa-
T04sanss08u:527: na ca sarvajñatācittôtpādarasadhātuḥ śakyaḥ sarvakarmakleśalohaiḥ saṃkleśayituṃ paryādātuṃ vā /
T04sanss08u:528: tad yathā kulaputrâikaḥ pradīpo yādṛśe gṛhe vā layane vā praveśyate sa saha praveśito varṣasahasrasaṃcitam api tamondhakāraṃ vidhamayati /
T04sanss08u:530: evam evâikaḥ sarvajñatācittôtpādapradīpo yādṛśe satvâśaye gahane 'vidyātamondhakārânugate
T04sanss08u:531: praveśyate sa saha praveśito 'nabhilāpyakalpaśatasahasrasaṃcitam api karmakleśâvaraṇatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati /
T04sanss08u:533: tad yathā kulaputra cintāmaṇirājamukuṭānāṃ mahānāgarājñāṃ nâsti parôpakramabhayaṃ /
T04sanss08u:534: evam eva bodhicittamahākaruṇācintāmaṇirājamukuṭâvabaddhānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ nâsti durgatyapāyaparôpakramabhayam iti //
T04sanss08u:536: ihôpāle mahāyānaṃ saṃprasthito bodhisatvaḥ sacet pūrvâhṇakālasamaye āpattim āpadyeta /
T04sanss08u:537: madhyâhnakālasamaye sarvajñatācittenâvirahito vihared aparyantâiva bodhisatvasya śīlaskandhaḥ /
T04sanss08u:538: sacen madhyâhnakālasamaye āpattim āpadyate sāyâhnakālasamaye sarvajñatācittenâvirahito bhaved aparyantâiva bodhisatvasya śīlaskandhaḥ /
T04sanss08u:540: evaṃ hy upāle saparihārā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ /
T04sanss08u:541: tatra bodhisatvena nâtikaukṛtyaparyutthānam utpādyaṃ nâtivipratisāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ /
T04sanss08u:542: sacet punaḥ śrāvakayānīyaḥ pudgalaḥ punaḥ punar āpattim āpadyeta /
